metadata.titleDefault: Pierre Guéroult — Software & AI Engineer in Paris
metadata.description: Pierre Guéroult is a Paris‑based software and AI engineer delivering full‑stack web apps, clean UI/UX, automation, analytics, and pragmatic product craft.
metadata.keywords: Pierre Guéroult, Pierre Gueroult, software engineer, AI engineer, Paris, full‑stack, web developer, Next.js, React, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, Node.js, NestJS, shadcn/ui, open‑source, Arqetype, portfolio, product engineering

altelis_engineer.title: Engineer in Web Development and AI
altelis_engineer.description: Starting my journey as an engineer in web development and artificial intelligence.

frameip_apprentice.title: Web Developer Apprentice
frameip_apprentice.description: Internal tool development in collaboration with the SOC for cybersecurity needs. Development of an export tool for the Sales department. Conception, development, and structuring of a career site project. Active participation in development team rituals (daily, planning, retrospective).

frameip_junior.title: Junior Web Developer
frameip_junior.description: Participated in the development of a CRM in an Agile environment using Scrum methodology. Code review and validation via GitLab merge requests. Active involvement in Scrum rituals: sprints, daily meetings, and retrospectives.

frameip_intern.title: Web Developer Intern
frameip_intern.description: Exploration of IS applications and understanding of business trades. Conception and development of a ticket management system within the intranet. Development of a ticketing feature in the intranet to facilitate partnership management.

cerp_admin.title: Administrative Services Employee
cerp_admin.description: Archiving of documents for administrative services. Ensuring proper classification, storage, and processing of files.

esiee_engineering.degree: Engineering Degree in Computer Science, Design, Architecture and Development
esiee_engineering.description: 3-year alternating rhythm (1 to 6 months) with increasing responsibility in the company. Engineering training in Computer Science, Design, Architecture, and Development, oriented towards practice and results.

iut_rouen_but.description: Deepening skills in web development and creation of interactive digital experiences. Game of the year project (top of class): design of an original video game with a 3D showcase site.

iut_rouen_dut.degree: DUT Multimedia and Internet Professions, Computer Science
iut_rouen_dut.description: Multidisciplinary training focused on digital content creation and web development. Treasurer of BDE Labete.

lycee_pablo_neruda.description: Specialties: Physics-Chemistry, Digital and Computer Sciences (NSI), Mathematics. European Section (English). Class delegate, member of CVL and Board of Administration.

opquast.title: Opquast: Web Project Quality Mastery (Expert 908 pts)

bde_treasurer.title: Treasurer
bde_treasurer.description: Treasurer in a student association: Expense management, cash management during events, member of the BDE board.

neruda_board.title: Board Member | CVL Member
neruda_board.description: Meetings with teachers and admin staff, budget meetings, preparation of board meetings, organization of open days (JPO).
